That notice is the forum asking your browser for permission to show popup notifications, which is different than "what kind" of notifications you get. Once you've given approval to the browser (the picture you posted), you can customize what alerts you receive by going to "Account Settings->Notification Settings" and also in "Manage Followed Content."

In there, you can manage if you want popups/emails/none, and how often you want to receive emailed content. If you don't want all the "facebooky" popup stuff, it can all be turned off.

 

Cheers,
~Claw
